channel.title: Error When Compiling!
channel.description:
Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL\SRL\Extended\xMapWalk.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL\SRL\Extended\xBank.scar does not exist. Failed when compiling :confused:
I have srl 4.00 and SCAR 2.03 And I have Dragged SRL folder from SCAR 3.12 into SCAR 2.03. Does anyone know where I can get those files from?
Please Help! I really want to use that flax script!!!

item.title: Error When Compiling!
item.dc:creator: @Monkey_wacko Monkey wacko
item.description:
@Monkey_wacko wrote:

I get the same problem

And i get different errors for ever script i try

Read full topic

item.title: Error When Compiling!
item.dc:creator: @hey321 hey321
item.description:
@hey321 wrote:

Try uninstalling every copy of scar you have, install 3.12 and download srl 4.00. The extended folder was either taken out of moved in 4.0. You have to use srl 4.0 scripts, if you get errors do not use it.

Read full topic
